description:
For three generations the Cooper family has been crafting a full range of spirits, cordials, and ready-to-drink cocktails from the heart of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Charles Jacquins et Cie., Inc., the oldest Cordial Producer in America and the largest in PA is expanding its product offering and reach throughout Pennsylvania. We are looking for energetic, self-confident, experienced salespeople to become a part of our Sales Team.

May live in MN, WI, IL or MO

JOB DESCRIPTION

Our Regional Sales Manager will be responsible for the execution of strategic initiatives, owning account coverage in 100 buying outlets within their respective territory. The primary function of this role is to collaborate with our distributors to ensure we have the right monthly programs and incentives in place to deliver the depletion & distribution targets, execute GSM trainings, manage inventory of product, present new items as we launch new innovation and act as an overall brand ambassador to Jacquins in the market. In addition, this role is to increase execution in buying outlets and build top of mind awareness, while hunting and opening 25 non buying outlets in a calendar year. The successful candidate will sell in and activate the Jacquins portfolio by cultivating strong working relationships with key accounts. This position will report directly to the Senior Vice President of Sales and has potential for growth and promotion within the organization.

Position Responsibilities
• Serves as primary contact for Charles Jacquin portfolio with MN, WI, IL, MO and their respective account universe.
• On-premise focus: building brand distribution, visibility, and increasing rate of sale in bars, restaurants, casinos, country clubs, stadiums, etc.
• Off-premise focus, increasing distribution, selling in displays, laser focus on shelf positioning and ensuring tents poles are activated.
• Align with key local events and partners and participate where the opportunity fits our strategy, including execution of national initiatives in your local market.
• Execute product seminars and brand trainings in accounts.
• Stay informed of customer and consumer trends.
• Provide activity report’s to supervisor, including list of objectives, accomplishments, competitive activity, special projects, and/or any specific needs.
• Review monthly goals and objectives with execution plan with manager.
• Provide feedback on effectiveness of marketing and sales initiatives, including programs, POS, advertising, etc.

Role Qualifications
• Min of 5 years’ work-related experience in with structured sales background, with Beverage Alcohol/Spirits.

Essential Skills and Experience
• Analytical skills, in particular gathering data from a wide variety of sources and presenting it in formats suitable for a wide variety of audiences.
• Sales and Marketing — Knowledge of principles and methods for showing, promoting, and selling products or services. This includes marketing strategy and tactics, product demonstration, sales techniques, and sales control systems
• Good managerial and effective presentation skills
• Excellent people skills
• Proficient using Microsoft Office including Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint

Physical Demands of the Role
• Must be able to carry/lift 45-65 lbs.
• Valid Drivers License
